text: Tsalikala Litsuwa lya Kwiyandaa, na litsuwa liwinzile likala Litsuwa lya Sabato. Iwakulu we Wayahudi ng'awabamile bae ng'uli tsisighale mna misalaba mne Litsuwa lya Sabato. Kwaapfila Litsuwa lya Sabato tsalikala litsuwa kulu. Wayahudi wamlomba Pilato ghamaghulu ghe iwanu iwawambighwe ghabenighwe, kuya mitufi yawo ihulumsighwe.
